title: üõ†Ô∏è ActiveCampaign tool MCP server üí™ all 48 operations
description:
Need help? Want access to this workflow + many more paid workflows + live Q&A sessions with a top verified n8n creator?

[Join the community](https://www.skool.com/beyond-nodes-automation-lab-2006/about)

Complete MCP server exposing all ActiveCampaign Tool operations to AI agents. Zero configuration needed - all 48 operations pre-built.

## ‚ö° Quick Setup

1. **Import** this workflow into your n8n instance
2. **Activate** the workflow to start your MCP server
3. **Copy** the webhook URL from the MCP trigger node
4. **Connect** AI agents using the MCP URL

## üîß How it Works

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **Tool Nodes**: Pre-configured for every ActiveCampaign Tool operation
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Uses official n8n ActiveCampaign Tool tool with full error handling

## üìã Available Operations (48 total)

Every possible ActiveCampaign Tool operation is included:

### üë§ Account (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an account**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an account**
‚Ä¢ **Get an account**
‚Ä¢ **Get many accounts**
‚Ä¢ **Update an account**

### üîß Accountcontact (3 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an account contact**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an account contact**
‚Ä¢ **Update an account contact**

### üîå Connection (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a connection**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a connection**
‚Ä¢ **Get a connection**
‚Ä¢ **Get many connections**
‚Ä¢ **Update a connection**

### üìá Contact (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a contact**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a contact**
‚Ä¢ **Get a contact**
‚Ä¢ **Get many contacts**
‚Ä¢ **Update a contact**

### üîß Contactlist (2 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Add a contact to a list**
‚Ä¢ **Remove a contact from a list**

### üîß Contacttag (2 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Add a contact tag**
‚Ä¢ **Remove a contact tag**

### üí∞ Deal (7 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a deal**
‚Ä¢ **Create a deal note**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a deal**
‚Ä¢ **Get a deal**
‚Ä¢ **Get many deals**
‚Ä¢ **Update a deal**
‚Ä¢ **Update a deal note**

### üîß Ecommercecustomer (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an e-commerce customer**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an e-commerce customer**
‚Ä¢ **Get an e-commerce customer**
‚Ä¢ **Get many e-commerce customers**
‚Ä¢ **Update an e-commerce customer**

### üîß Ecommerceorder (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an e-commerce order**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an e-commerce order**
‚Ä¢ **Get an e-commerce order**
‚Ä¢ **Get many e-commerce orders**
‚Ä¢ **Update an e-commerce order**

### üîß Ecommerceorderproducts (3 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get many ecommerce orders**
‚Ä¢ **Get an e-commerce order product by product ID**
‚Ä¢ **Get an e-commerce order product by order ID**

### üìù List (1 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get many lists**

### üè∑Ô∏è Tag (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a tag**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a tag**
‚Ä¢ **Get a tag**
‚Ä¢ **Get many tags**
‚Ä¢ **Update a tag**

## ü§ñ AI Integration

**Parameter Handling**: AI agents automatically provide values for:
‚Ä¢ Resource IDs and identifiers
‚Ä¢ Search queries and filters
‚Ä¢ Content and data payloads
‚Ä¢ Configuration options

**Response Format**: Native ActiveCampaign Tool API responses with full data structure

**Error Handling**: Built-in n8n error management and retry logic

## üí° Usage Examples

Connect this MCP server to any AI agent or workflow:

‚Ä¢ **Claude Desktop**: Add MCP server URL to configuration
‚Ä¢ **Custom AI Apps**: Use MCP URL as tool endpoint
‚Ä¢ **Other n8n Workflows**: Call MCP tools from any workflow
‚Ä¢ **API Integration**: Direct HTTP calls to MCP endpoints

## ‚ú® Benefits

‚Ä¢ **Complete Coverage**: Every ActiveCampaign Tool operation available
‚Ä¢ **Zero Setup**: No parameter mapping or configuration needed
‚Ä¢ **AI-Ready**: Built-in `$fromAI()` expressions for all parameters
‚Ä¢ **Production Ready**: Native n8n error handling and logging
‚Ä¢ **Extensible**: Easily modify or add custom logic

> üÜì **[Free for community use](https://github.com/Cfomodz/community-use)!** Ready to deploy in under 2 minutes.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
